mapper.select: SELECT l.FID filmId, l.title title, l.description description, l.category category, l.price price, l.actors actors, f.rental_duration duration, l.length length, l.rating rating, f.release_year releaseYear, f.special_features specialFeatures FROM film_list l INNER JOIN film f ON l.FID = f.film_id WHERE f.film_id = #{filmId}
